name: FYSICAL FENCING
description:
Fight atop the tallest mountain with your colleagues in physics-based combat and movement.  Supports local 2 player, where each player controls one side of the keyboard.

Modes:

FENCING - 1 hit K.O. Be careful and try to hit your opponent anywhere on their body.

FIGHTING - Each hit takes off a chunk of health. First to reach 0% health loses.

How many wins it takes to win the entire match can be customized.
